item.description:
GLILA (Greater Lowell Interfaith Leaders Alliance) will sponser there annual Service to end Genocide today at St. Vartanantz Church in Chelmsford. If you would like to attend this service please contact Ryuoh Shonin for more information. Last years service was attended by many different faith groups. The service is a good way to meet others of different faiths and learn, make new friends and deepen your own faith. Join us.

www.newenglandbuddhist.org
item.name: Interfaith Service "Service to end Genocide"
